name: The Great Nebula Offensive
description:
Defend Your Home!

Bob, weave, and blast your way through an alien armada to retake your homeworld and put an end to the alien threat!

In With the Old and in With the New!

Experience an extremely difficult and skill expressive bullet-hell that combines the look and difficulty of classic arcade games with modern movement and mechanics

Any Feedback?

If you have any feedback you can email me at:

anotherwhiterussian@live.com

I am a student in college trying to work in the video game industry and this is my first published project so any feedback you might have is appreciated! 

Enjoy the game and thanks for playing :)
